name: Laws of UX cards
description:
Hope this collection of UX law cards helps you whenever you are giving design presentations to stakeholders, explaining the rational reasons behind your design decisions to you peers, or keeping yourself as a reminder when you are designing products, or just simply learning with your curiosity. For more information, please visit Jon Yablonski 's website.
